title: Cubies
description: 2.5D voxel game prototype inspired by classic blockbuilding games such as The Blockheads. Implements procedural world generation with temperature and humidity-based biomes, simple physics, and an editable terrain pipeline.

title: Aviawork
description: Business workflow web app with role/category-driven permissions. Frontend built in Next.js + TypeScript; backend microservices in ASP.NET Core running on Azure Kubernetes Service. Features job allocation, role enums preservation, and audit logging.
